newsitem.title: PERU: Peru reaches $222 mln debt accord with U.K.
newsitem.headline: Peru reaches $222 mln debt accord with U.K.

text.p: Peru has concluded a $222 million debt renegotiation with the United Kingdom under the umbrella of its negotiations with Paris Club creditors, British embassy and local officials said Thursday.
The deal was struck during recent talks in Lima between visiting British officials and Economy Ministry negotiators, the officials said.
They could not give more details of the accord, which was part of Peru's ongoing bilateral negotiations with each of the 14 members of the Paris Club.
Peru reached a preliminary restructuring agreement with the Paris Club in July.
